HOUSING OPPORTUNITY PARTNERS REO, LLC
v.
Marianne MEHALSHICK and Michael A. Mehalshick Petition of: Marianne Mehalshick No. 618 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 23, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 23rd day of January, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
